Generation IX.Scarlet: It has a vicious temperament, contrary to what its appearance may suggest. It wraps its long bodies around prey, then drags the prey into its den.
Generation IX.Violet: A variety of fish Pokémon, Wugtrio was once considered to be a regional form of Dugtrio .

Generation IX.Scarlet: West Province: Area Two North Province: Area One , Area Three North Province: Area One ( Ground Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ )
Generation IX.Violet: West Province: Area Two North Province: Area One , Area Three North Province: Area One ( Ground Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ )
